titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to clarify that employment in any position at a nonprofit organization is a public service job for purposes of the public service loan forgiveness program, and for other purposes.
Public Service Expansion Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Public Service Expansion Act
This bill revises the definition of a public service job to include working at any nonprofit organization, regardless of the organization's mission, for the purposes of student loan repayment and public service student loan forgiveness.
